lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, July 2 -- A report from the Berlin correspondent of the Aftonbladet, who has been reporting the occupation of Russian towns from twenty-four to forty-eight hours in advance of the event, states that Murmansk fell into German hands yesterday.
